name: Trasta
description:
A game in the genre of "survival game".
Your goal is to live as many days as possible and not die.
To do this, you will have to craft items, weapons, build a house.
One of the main tasks is to look for food, thirst.
Find materials and build a shelter.
Make a bonfire for cooking.
Do your best to survive.
There are also local residents who are trying to kill an uninvited guest.
Avoid them, as you have only one life.
